scenario_text.value: Man, where could Miu be hiding?
I hope she’s not crying somewhere...

(Kaito always gets this surprisingly gentle
look on his face when he’s like this.)

(He must really care for Miu to act this
way.)

(Though to be honest, from what little I did
see of her, she struck me as kind of weird.)

Takuma? Why’re you starin’ at my face like
that? You’ve been givin’ me the oddest looks.

Oh, I was just trying to think what your
sister must be like.
Yeah? What do you wanna know?

(It’s hard to know how to answer when he asks
me like that.)

(Should I ask what he likes most about her?
Or maybe what he finds cutest?)

(Then again, that might make him feel
embarrassed.)

(What else is there? I guess I could ask if
it’s annoying having a sister.)
(What’s my number one question?)
What do you love most?
What makes her cute?
Does it get annoying?
So, what is it you love most about Miu?
Huh?! What kinda question is that?!

Oh, well, to look at you, I’d never think
you’d be so overprotective of your sister.

So I was thinking you really must care for
her, and I wondered why that was.
Don’t get any weird ideas.

I don’t have a thing for my sister, and it’s
not like I’m all lovey-dovey with her either.

So it’s just... You know... She’s family,
okay?
(I knew he’d get embarrassed!)
You shouldn’t ask such weird questions!

What would you say is the cutest thing about
Miu?

You...you wanna know why I think my sister’s
cute?

This better not be something creepy, or
I swear...
What? No, no! Not at all!

I just don’t know what it’s like to have
a sister, so I was wondering how you felt.

You wanna know what it’s like? She’s
stubborn, selfish, and never does what I say.
There’s nothing cute about her.

(But he’s still got that caring look about
him, even as he says that.)

(Such a change from before. The look in his
eyes... I thought he was going to kill me.)

Doesn’t it ever get annoying having a sister?
Like, for real.
I mean, I’d be lying if I said it didn’t.

When Miu was younger, she’d follow me around
everywhere, pestering me all the time.

I remember thinking she was really annoying
then.
But that was a long time ago.
So, you don’t feel that way anymore?

No, I don’t. If anything, I feel like now
I can’t leave her alone.

(Sometimes when Kaito talks about Miu he
seems regretful. I wonder why that is.)

Well, one thing’s for sure. You really do
care about her.

I’m... I’m all she has. So I have to look out
for her.

I’m the only one Miu can rely on, so I need
to do everything I can to keep her safe.
